siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: MyWebAR is the easiest way to build cross-platform augmented reality instantly available in a browser. Whether you are a professional developer or have no prior experience, we have the set of tools that will allow you to get started in the matter of minutes.
blogPost.body: MyWebAR is the easiest way to build cross-platform augmented reality instantly available in a browser. Whether you are a professional developer or have no prior experience, we have the set of tools that will allow you to get started in the matter of minutes.
blogPost.title: MyWebAR 2.0 - The easiest way to create webAR
blogPost.author: Anna Belova

localize.description: MyWebAR是构建跨平台增强现实的最简单方法，可以立即在浏览器中使用。无论您是专业开发人员还是没有经验，我们都有一套工具可以让您在几分钟内入门。
MyWebAR是構建跨平臺增強現實的最簡單方法，可以立即在瀏覽器中使用。無論您是專業開發人員還是沒有經驗，我們都有一套工具可以讓您在幾分鐘內入門。

previous.excerpt: Sometimes words just aren't enough... on Monet, send a drawing to make a new connection. :~)
previous.title: Monet - Draw your way to love, to friends, and to a good time.

localize.description: 有时候光靠语言是不够的……在Monet上，发送绘图以建立新连接。：~)
localize.tagline: 画出你通往爱情、朋友和快乐时光的道路。

localize.description: 有時候光靠語言是不夠的……在Monet上，發送繪圖以建立新連接。：~)
localize.tagline: 畫出你通往愛情、朋友和快樂時光的道路。

next.excerpt: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.
next.title: Flex Widgets - A widget editor for iPhone and iPad

localize.description: Flex Widgets是iPhone和iPad的第一个真正的Widget编辑器。它允许您通过在小部件上放置元素，然后编辑、移动、调整大小和分层这些元素来自由构建小部件。所有这些都在一个超级直观的编辑器中完成。
localize.tagline: 适用于iPhone和iPad的小部件编辑器

localize.description: Flex Widgets是iPhone和iPad的第一個真正的Widget編輯器。它允許您通過在小部件上放置元素，然後編輯、移動、調整大小和分層這些元素來自由構建小部件。所有這些都在一個超級直觀的編輯器中完成。
localize.tagline: 適用於iPhone和iPad的小部件編輯器
